name: Rilex Pump
overview:
Established in the year 2008, we, “Rilex Pump Industries”, as an ISO 9001:2008 certified company hold all the cards for manufacturing and supplying the best-in- class range of Open Well Submersible Pump, V Series Submersible Pump and Mini Open Well Submersible Pump.

Our products: Established in the year 2008, we, “Rilex Pump Industries”, as an ISO 9001:2008 certified company hold all the cards for manufacturing and supplying the best-in- class range of Open Well Submersible Pump, V Series Submersible Pump and Mini Open Well Submersible Pump.

Our Team: Backed by dedicated and determined team of professionals, we have been able to provide our valued customers with Open Well Submersible Pump, V Series Submersible Pump and Mini Open Well Submersible Pump.

Our Quality: Being a quality driven organization, we pay utmost prominence towards qualitative aspect of our range of Open Well Submersible Pump, V Series Submersible Pump and Mini Open Well Submersible Pump.

Our Infrastructure: We possess a sound and sprawling infrastructure setup at Rajkot (Gujarat, India). To ensure smooth execution of entire business related activities, we have systematically segregated our setup into multiple units such as manufacturing, quality testing, designing, warehouse and administration office.

Client Satisfaction: All our continual efforts are entirely focused towards acquiring total contentment of of our clients. To meet their requirements with the best, we are offering a precision-designed range of Open Well Submersible Pump, V Series Submersible Pump and Mini Open Well Submersible Pump.
